◆ A Message From the Commander PERSONAL

I am Commander Dorsal Finnegan, retired anglerfish, 247 years of service to the Abyssal Fleet. I founded DeepCurrent Strategic in 2987 because I was tired of surface-dwellers making policy about the ocean floor without consulting a single cephalopod. We are not a "fish tank." We are a think tank. The bed & breakfast was my wife Meredith's idea. She is a hagfish. She handles hospitality. I handle existential threats to the continental shelf. We make it work.

* Commander Finnegan's bioluminescent lure is for professional purposes only. Do not stare at it. Do not compliment it. He knows it's bright.

◆ WiFi Access Protocol MANDATORY

For security reasons, the WiFi password rotates every 3,600 seconds and is always a dance move. To connect, you must physically perform the designated dance move in front of Lobby Camera 3. Footage is reviewed by Gerald (hagfish, front desk). Gerald's approval is final and non-negotiable.

Connection Steps:

  1. Locate Lobby Camera 3 (the one with googly eyes)
  2. Perform the current dance move (see right panel)
  3. Wait for Gerald's approval (1-47 minutes)
  4. Check your pressure-sealed device for network "DEEPCURRENT_SECURE_5G"
  5. Enter the dance move name as the password (all caps, no spaces)

Gerald has rejected 68% of all dance move attempts this quarter. His standards are rising. We are concerned but also proud.
